#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long int n, a[200005], dp[200005];

int main()
{
	long long int i, k, ans, j;
	
	cin>>n;
	for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		cin>>a[i];
		dp[i] = 999999999;
	}
	
	dp[0] = 0;
	
	for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		for (j = 1; i + j < n; j = j * 2) {
			dp[i + j] = min(dp[i + j], (dp[i] + abs(a[i + j] - a[i])));
		}
	}
	
	cout<<dp[n - 1]<<endl;
	
	return 0;
}
